price: Then I will come against them from their front and from their back, from their right and from their left[5], and You will not find most of them grateful.”
arabic: ثُمَّ لَأٓتِيَنَّهُم مِّنۢ بَيۡنِ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَمِنۡ خَلۡفِهِمۡ وَعَنۡ أَيۡمَٰنِهِمۡ وَعَن شَمَآئِلِهِمۡۖ وَلَا تَجِدُ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ شَٰكِرِينَ
footnotes: [5] This shows how purposeful and determined Satan really is in his mission. Such an enemy should be guarded against with constant vigilance.
